channel.title: Client Error For others! Please HelP!
channel.description:
I just portforwared
People who downloaded the client say it says
"Connection Error Retrying in 10 sec" But everyone can use the mopar client.
Please help!

item.title: Client Error For others! Please HelP!
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

That message usually pops up with clients that have issues loading data from the cache.

Read full topic
item.source: Client Error For others! Please HelP!
